info.name: Log Cleaner
info.summary: Administrator Tool for cleaning up the logfile
info.description:
**Administrator Tool for cleaning up the logfile**
- ✅ Only accessable for Administrators. - ✅ Error levels with different colors. - ✅ Number of displayed log entries can be set. - ✅ After correcting a log entry it can be deleted from the log file. - ✅ One click deletion of all dublicates within the logfile.
info.author: Wolfgang Tödt
